note.p: Australian draper. Born in Scotland, the son of James Stewart, artist, of Glasgow. In Australia, 1843–62. From St Kilda, Port Phillip (now Melbourne), Victoria, 1847–51. A portraitist living in Gravesend, Kent, 1871.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/891/21/33)
Colonies and India from London, 26 October 1895, p. 29
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 March 2017)
Port Phillip, Australia, directory, 1847 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 March 2017)
Scotland old parish registers births 622/ 80 64 Barony p. 64 (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 23 March 2017)
